cause.description:
We all know that Jack Thompson is a complete and total dick, but has anyone ever done anything about it? I hope so, but apparently its not enough, b/c he's still out there, shouting out his anti-video game, completely false, BULLSHIT! So i created this cause to fight him. Tell all your gamer friends and fight Jack Thompson!
1. Jack Thompson is liar and should not be taken seriously.
2. All his anti-video game propganda is completely false.
3. He has no factual basis and is using video games as a scapegoat for society's problems.
4. He is injustly stereotyping every gamer on this world as an evil killer.
cause.name: Fight that SOB Jack Thompson!
